types1:Item.types1:Name: AllscriptsPracticeManagement1402
types1:Item.types1:Description: Allscripts Practice Management APIs for PRO-PM GA Practice Management 14.0.2 (AZURE)

businessConnector.name: AllscriptsPracticeManagement1402
businessConnector.description: Allscripts Practice Management APIs for PRO-PM GA Practice Management 14.0.2 (AZURE)

action.label: GetUserAuthentication
action.name: GetUserAuthentication
action.description: Authenticates a user against the PM system. This ties the Unity Security Token to the authenticated user.

parameter.description: Allscripts Practice Management password
parameter.name: Password

parameter.description: Application Version (for version matrix checking)
parameter.name: AppVersion

action.label: GetServerInfo
action.name: GetServerInfo
action.description: Gets local information about the server hosting the Unity web service.

action.label: GetAdditionalInfoByPatient
action.name: GetAdditionalInfoByPatient
action.description: Return all additional info fields and their corresponding values if present for specified patient.

action.label: GetGenders
action.name: GetGenders
action.description: Returns valid values for Gender.

action.label: GetMaritalStatuses
action.name: GetMaritalStatuses
action.description: Returns valid values for Marital Status.

action.label: GetPatient
action.name: GetPatient
action.description: Returns a patient's demographic information, including insurance, guarantor, and PCP information.

parameter.description: Internal patient identifier. If not supplied, parameter 1 is required.
parameter.name: PatientID

parameter.description: PM Patient number
parameter.name: PatientNumber

action.label: GetPatientAdditionalInfoValues
action.name: GetPatientAdditionalInfoValues
action.description: Returns valid values for any patient additional info field with a field type of combo box.

parameter.description: Patient additional info field name with a field type of combo box.
parameter.name: AdditionalInfo

action.label: GetPatientByMRN
action.name: GetPatientByMRN
action.description: Get patient demographics by MRN.

parameter.description: Patient's medical record number.
parameter.name: MRN

action.label: GetPatientDemographics
action.name: GetPatientDemographics
action.description: Returns basic patient demographic information such as name, age, sex, and contact information. To retrieve a more comprehensive set of demographic data (including insurance, PCP, and other information), use GetPatient or GetPatientByMRN.

parameter.description: Allscripts Internal Patient ID
parameter.name: PatientID

parameter.description: PM Patient Number
parameter.name: PatientNumber

parameter.description: When set to "Y", all contacts that share an account will be returned.
parameter.name: AccountFlag

action.label: GetRelationships
action.name: GetRelationships
action.description: Returns valid values for Relationship based on relationship type (Guarantor, Subscriber, Emergency Contact).

parameter.description: E = Emergency Contact G = Guarantor S = Subscriber
parameter.name: RelationshipType

action.label: SavePatient
action.name: SavePatient
action.description: Adds or updates patient demographic information.

parameter.description: <patient> <patientID>21</patientID> <!-- specify if updating a patient --> <lastName>Collections</lastName> <firstName>Carrie</firstName> <mi></mi> <suffix></suffix> <gender>F</gender> <ssn>555555555</ssn> <dob>1980-01-25</dob> <street1>123 Blue Street</street1> <street2>Apartment 321</street2> <city>Santa Clara</city> <state>CA</state> <zip>99999</zip> <phone>3122345467</phone> <workphone>2125551212</workphone> <workphoneext>1234</workphoneext> <cellphone>2127771212</cellphone> <email>test@example.com</email> <ethnicity>Not Hispanic / Latino</ethnicity> <language>Swahili</language> <race>American Indian/Alaska Native</race> <maritalstatus>X</maritalstatus> <HIPAAStmtExp>5/5/2020</HIPAAStmtExp> <usualprov>MARFEE</usualprov><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <referringdr>MARFEE</referringdr><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <pcp>MARFEE</pcp><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <employer>AHS</employer><!-- GetEmployers.Abbreviation --> <employmentstatus/> <studentstatus/> <IsGuarantor/><!-- Y/N --> <RelationToGuarantor/> <IsEmergencyContact/><!--Y/N --> <EmergencyContactRelation/> </patient>
parameter.name: XMLPayLoad
parameter.testWith: <patient> <patientID></patientID> <!-- specify if updating a patient --> <lastName>Collins</lastName> <firstName>Carrie</firstName> <mi></mi> <suffix></suffix> <gender>F</gender> <ssn>555555555</ssn> <dob>1980-01-25</dob> <street1>123 Blue Street</street1> <street2>Apartment 321</street2> <city>Santa Clara</city> <state>CA</state> <zip>99999</zip> <phone>3122345467</phone> <workphone>2125551212</workphone> <workphoneext>1234</workphoneext> <cellphone>2127771212</cellphone> <email>test@example.com</email> <ethnicity></ethnicity> <language>English</language> <race>American Indian/Alaska Native</race> <maritalstatus>X</maritalstatus> <HIPAAStmtExp>5/5/2020</HIPAAStmtExp> <usualprov>MARFEE</usualprov><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <referringdr>MARFEE</referringdr><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <pcp>MARFEE</pcp><!-- GetPractitioners.Abbreviation --> <employer>AHS</employer><!-- GetEmployers.Abbreviation --> <employmentstatus></employmentstatus> <studentstatus></studentstatus> <IsGuarantor></IsGuarantor><!-- Y/N --> <RelationToGuarantor></RelationToGuarantor> <IsEmergencyContact></IsEmergencyContact><!--Y/N --> <EmergencyContactRelation></EmergencyContactRelation> </patient>

action.label: SearchPatients
action.name: SearchPatients
action.description: Searches for a patient with arbitrary search parameters. Returns only patients for which the user has access. A maximum of 100 matched patients is returned.

parameter.description: Search value. The search value can be any part of the demographics, MRN, or EMPI. Examples include: '16483031': Returns patient with the specified MRN number. 'of': Returns Jesse Hofmann, Waldof Smith, and so forth. 'Hof, Jes': Returns Jesse Hofmann. 'Hof Mann,': Returns Jesse Hof mann. 'Hof, Jes 4/1/1990': Returns Jesse Hofmann born on April 1, 1990. 'Smith, John 4/1970': Returns all John Smiths born in April 1970. 'Smith, John 1970': Returns all John Smiths born in 1970. 'Jesse Ja': Does not return Jesse James Hofmann. 'J*e*': Returns Jesse Hofmann. 'J.sse': Returns Jesse Hofmann, but not JeEsse Hofmann.
parameter.name: Parameter1

action.label: GetDiagnoses
action.name: GetDiagnoses
action.description: Returns diagnosis history for a patient or based on a date range.

action.label: SetPatientAdditionalInfoValue
action.name: SetPatientAdditionalInfoValue
action.description: Sets the value for the given patient additional info field.

parameter.description: Patient additional info field value.
parameter.name: FieldValue

parameter.description: Patient additional info field name.
parameter.name: FieldName

action.label: GetNotes
action.name: GetNotes
action.description: Return patient notes for specified patient or account.

parameter.description: Identifier for specific note
parameter.name: NoteID

parameter.description: Only return notes of specific type. See GetNoteTypes.
parameter.name: NoteType

parameter.description: Only return notes that generate a warning in patient record (Y/N). All options returned by default.
parameter.name: WarningFlag

parameter.description: Return all notes on patient account (Y/N). Default = N
parameter.name: AccountFlag

action.label: GetNoteTypes
action.name: GetNoteTypes
action.description: Returns all available patient note types.

action.label: SavePatientNote
action.name: SavePatientNote
action.description: Create patient note.

parameter.name: NoteXML
parameter.testWith: "<PatientNote> <Text> hello </Text><!-- 7500 character max --> <Subject> patient </Subject><!-- 80 character max --> <NoteTypeID>1</NoteTypeID><!-- see GetNoteTypes --> <ExpDate></ExpDate><!-- Date only --> </PatientNote>"

action.label: GetBatchDetail
action.name: GetBatchDetail
action.description: Returns details for a single batch or set of batches.

parameter.description: Batch #
parameter.name: BatchNumber

parameter.description: P = Payment, C = Charge, V = Void
parameter.name: BatchType

parameter.description: O = Open, C = Closed
parameter.name: BatchStatus

parameter.description: Batch create/opened date
parameter.name: BatchDate

action.label: GetCarriers
action.name: GetCarriers
action.description: Get insurance carrier details.

parameter.description: Filter to apply to carrier name or code/abbreviation.
parameter.name: Filter

action.label: GetDepartments
action.name: GetDepartments
action.description: Returns all departments in the system to which the logged in user has access.

action.label: GetLocations
action.name: GetLocations
action.description: Returns a list of billing locations configured in the system.

action.label: GetPatientAccountBalance
action.name: GetPatientAccountBalance
action.description: Gets account balance information for a given patient. Returns a record for each patient voucher. Aggregated final balance needs to be calculated from result set.

parameter.description: "B" = billing date. If not provided, result set is sorted by service date and voucher number.
parameter.name: SortOrder

parameter.description: Y/N - Determines if only self-pay charges should be returned. Default is N.
parameter.name: SelfPayOnly

action.label: GetPatientAccountBalanceCalc
action.name: GetPatientAccountBalanceCalc
action.description: Returns basic patient account balance information calculated from GetPatientAccountBalance.

parameter.description: Department abbreviation.
parameter.name: Department

parameter.description: Place of service abbreviation.
parameter.name: PlaceOfService

parameter.description: Location abbreviation.
parameter.name: Location

parameter.description: Determines whether the balance returned is at the account level or patient level. Default is patient. Valid values (Y/N)
parameter.name: AccountFlag

action.label: GetPatientPolicy
action.name: GetPatientPolicy
action.description: Returns policy information for given patient

parameter.description: P=Primary, S=Secondary, T=Tertiary, X=Other
parameter.name: Coverage

parameter.description: M=Medical, V=Motor Vehicle, D=Dental, H=Behavioral Health, W=Workers Comp
parameter.name: CoverageType

action.label: GetPatientSlidingFeeInfo
action.name: GetPatientSlidingFeeInfo
action.description: Returns all sliding fee scales associated with given patient.

action.label: GetPlacesOfService
action.name: GetPlacesOfService
action.description: Returns a list of places of service configured in the environment. Required for charged entry.

action.label: GetServicesByVoucherID
action.name: GetServicesByVoucherID
action.description: Returns details of services and procedures provided in a visit that are tied to a given voucher. See GetPatientAccountBalance for vouchers for a given patient.

parameter.description: Internal ID for voucher. See GetPatientAccountBalance.
parameter.name: VoucherID

action.label: GetSlidingFeeScales
action.name: GetSlidingFeeScales
action.description: Returns sliding fee scales available in current system.

action.label: GetTransactionCodes
action.name: GetTransactionCodes
action.description: Get list of available transaction codes.

action.label: ReopenBatch
action.name: ReopenBatch
action.description: Re-Opens a closed batch.

action.label: SavePatientPolicy
action.name: SavePatientPolicy
action.description: Adds existing carrier and plan to specified patient record.

parameter.description: Carrier abbreviation.
parameter.name: CarrierAbbr

parameter.description: Insurance plan code.
parameter.name: PlanCode

parameter.description: Insurance plan code for specialist.
parameter.name: SpecialistPlanCode

parameter.description: P = Primary S = Secondary T = Tertiary X = Other
parameter.name: Priority

parameter.description: Required if performing an update.
parameter.name: PolicyID

parameter.description: <policy> <Group_Name></Group_Name><!--40 chars--> <Group_No></Group_No><!--20 chars--> <Policy_Phone></Policy_Phone><!--20 chars--> <Policy_Phone_Ext></Policy_Phone_Ext><!--5 chars--> <Certificate_No></Certificate_No><!-- 20 chars--> <Comments></Comments><!--80 chars --> <Effective_Date></Effective_Date><!--datetime--> <Expiration_Date></Expiration_Date><!--datetime--> <Subscriber_Certificate_Suffix></Subscriber_Certificate_Suffix><!-- 8 chars--> </policy>
parameter.name: XMLPayload

action.label: SavePatientSlidingFee
action.name: SavePatientSlidingFee
action.description: Adds a sliding scale to a given patient record.

parameter.description: Internal ID of an existing sliding fee scale for a patient. When provided, the current record is modified. See GetPatientSlidingFeeInfo.
parameter.name: TransID

parameter.description:
<SlidingFeeInfo> <SlidingFeeAbbr></SlidingFeeAbbr> <HouseholdIncome>30000.00</HouseholdIncome> <FamilyMembers>4</FamilyMembers> <LockInDate>9/15/2014</LockInDate> <EndDate>9/15/2015</EndDate> <FlatFeeAmount>5.00</FlatFeeAmount> <PercentToPay>60.0</PercentToPay> <MinimumToPay>10.00</MinimumToPay> <MaximumToPay>25.00</MaximumToPay> <Comments>Free text up to 80 characters</Comments> </SlidingFeeInfo>
For valid SlidingFeeAbbr values, see GetSlidingFeeScales
parameter.name: XMLPayload

action.label: SavePaymentTransaction
action.name: SavePaymentTransaction
action.description: Saves a payment transaction. If no voucher is specified, payment is saved as an unassigned transaction.

parameter.description: <Ntierprise_Msg> <REMIT> <Payment_Amount>10.00</Payment_Amount> <Reference>13094043</Reference> <External_Account_ID/><!--Patient Account Number--> <Patient_Number>1234</Patient_Number> <IsCopay>0</IsCopay><!--BIT - 1/0--> <External_Transaction_Code>COPCASH</External_Transaction_Code><!-- Optional --> <Appointment_External_ID>12345</Appointment_External_ID><!-- Optional --> <External_Batch_Number/> <!-- Optional --> <Batch_Category /><!-- Optional --> <Reference></Reference><!--Required: 30 char limit--> <Patient_First_Name>Thomas</Patient_First_Name> <Patient_Last_Name>Smith</Patient_Last_Name> <BatchID>12</BatchID><!-- Optional --> <VoucherID>23</VoucherID><!-- Optional --> <PractitionerAbbr></PractitionerAbbr><!-- Optional --> <description></description><!-- Optional: 255 character limit --> <Location>PC-Main</Location><!-- Optional: Location abbreviation --> <Dept>Medical</Dept><!-- Optional: Department abbreviation --> <CCAuthNo/><!-- Optional: 20 char max --> <CCTransID/><!-- Optional: 50 char max --> </REMIT> </Ntierprise_Msg>
parameter.name: XMLPayload
parameter.testWith: "<Ntierprise_Msg> <REMIT> <Payment_Amount>10.00</Payment_Amount> <Reference>13094043</Reference> <External_Account_ID/><!--Patient Account Number--> <Patient_Number>1234</Patient_Number> <IsCopay>0</IsCopay><!--BIT - 1/0--> <External_Transaction_Code>MRPMT</External_Transaction_Code><!-- Optional --> <Appointment_External_ID>12345</Appointment_External_ID><!-- Optional --> <External_Batch_Number/> <!-- Optional --> <Batch_Category /><!-- Optional --> <Reference></Reference><!--Required: 30 char limit--> <Patient_First_Name>Thomas</Patient_First_Name> <Patient_Last_Name>Smith</Patient_Last_Name> <BatchID></BatchID><!-- Optional --> <VoucherID>23</VoucherID><!-- Optional --> <PractitionerAbbr></PractitionerAbbr><!-- Optional --> <description></description><!-- Optional: 255 character limit --> <Location></Location><!-- Optional: Location abbreviation --> <Dept></Dept><!-- Optional: Department abbreviation --> <CCAuthNo/><!-- Optional: 20 char max --> <CCTransID/><!-- Optional: 50 char max --> </REMIT> </Ntierprise_Msg>"

action.label: GetChangedPatients
action.name: GetChangedPatients
action.description: Returns a list of Patient IDs that have had something change in their records since a specific date/time.

parameter.description: Can be supplied to check on a particular patient.
parameter.name: PatientID

parameter.description: Datetime indicating how far back to query.
parameter.name: Since

parameter.description: Optionally return only active patients
parameter.name: ActiveOnlyFlag

parameter.description: If "Y" then details of what changed are returned: new = the patient is a new patient dem = patient demographics have changed ins = one or more insurance details changed guar = guarantor information has changed section Trans ID
parameter.name: Verbose

action.label: GetEmployers
action.name: GetEmployers
action.description: Returns all existing employers.

parameter.description: Filter applied to name or abbreviation.
parameter.name: Filter

action.label: SaveAccountContact
action.name: SaveAccountContact
action.description: Add or edit a non-patient contact on an existing patient account.

parameter.description: Internal identifier for patient account.
parameter.name: AccountID

parameter.description: Internal identifier for account contact. Required if performing an edit.
parameter.name: ContactID

parameter.description: <contact> <lastName>Paterson</lastName> <firstName>Stella</firstName> <mi>M</mi> <suffix></suffix> <gender>F</gender> <ssn>123546789</ssn> <dob>1/1/1956</dob> <street1>123 Main St.</street1> <street2></street2> <city>Burlington</city> <state>VT</state> <zip>05403</zip> <phone>8025559999</phone> <workphone></workphone> <workphoneext></workphoneext> <cellphone></cellphone> <email>stella@paterson.edu</email> <employer></employer><!-- abbreviation --> <IsGuarantor>Y</IsGuarantor> <IsEmergencyContact>N</IsEmergencyContact> <EmergencyContactRelation/> <IsSubscriber /><!--y/n--> <CanGetStatements/><!--y/n--> <comments></comments> </contact>
parameter.name: ContactXML

action.label: SaveEmployer
action.name: SaveEmployer
action.description: Create a new employer record and/or add employer to a patient.

parameter.description: Unique code for employer. Required when mapping existing employer to patient. See: GetEmployers
parameter.name: EmployerAbbr

parameter.description: Required when creating a new employer record. <Employer> <Abbreviation>AHS</Abbreviation><!--8 char max--> <Name>Allscripts</Name><!--40 char max--> <Contact_Name>James Medici</Contact_Name><!--40 char max--> <Street1>2377 Neuport Lane</Street1><!--40 char max--> <City>Los Angeles</City><!--30 char max--> <State>CA</State><!--3 char max--> <Zip>90009</Zip><!--9 char max--> <Phone>6552095640</Phone> <PhoneExt>6552095640</PhoneExt> <Fax>3219543012</Fax> <Email>jm@email.com</Email><!--255 char max--> </Employer>
parameter.name: XMLPayload

action.label: GetServices
action.name: GetServices
action.description: Return procedure history by patient or based on a date range.

action.label: GetOperators
action.name: GetOperators
action.description: Retrieve a list of operators in the system.

parameter.description: Applies a search filter to either last name or abbreviation.
parameter.name: Filter

action.label: GetPractitioners
action.name: GetPractitioners
action.description: Returns a list of available practitioners.

parameter.description: Optional search term. Search is based on last name or practitioner abbreviation.
parameter.name: SearchTerm

parameter.description: Optional flag (Y/N) to only return referring providers.
parameter.name: RefProviderOnlyFlag

action.label: GetResourceByID
action.name: GetResourceByID
action.description: Returns resource details by ID.

parameter.description: Internal ID for resource. See GetResources.
parameter.name: ResourceID

action.label: GetAppointmentCancellationReasons
action.name: GetAppointmentCancellationReasons
action.description: Returns a list of valid cancellation reasons in the system.

action.label: GetAppointmentConfirmationResults
action.name: GetAppointmentConfirmationResults
action.description: Returns list of options for confirmation results when confirming an appointment.

action.label: GetAppointmentsByChangeDTTM
action.name: GetAppointmentsByChangeDTTM
action.description: Returns all appointments within the given date range. If a last pulled date is used (Parameter3), then only appointments that have been modified or created since that date are returned.

parameter.description: Starting date for appointment list. Accepts date time format. If no date is provided, this value will default to the current date and time.
parameter.name: ApptStartDate

parameter.description: Ending date for appointment list. If not used, all appointments are returned starting from appointment start date (Parameter1).
parameter.name: ApptEndDate

parameter.description: If used, the appointments returned are only those that have been modified/changed since this date and time.
parameter.name: LastPulled

action.label: GetAppointmentTypes
action.name: GetAppointmentTypes
action.description: Returns a list of available appointment type codes.

action.label: GetAvailableSchedule
action.name: GetAvailableSchedule
action.description: Gets schedule availability based on resource, date, location, and department.

parameter.description: Appointment resource abbreviation. See GetResources.
parameter.name: Resource

parameter.description: Starting date (inclusive YYYY-MM-DD).
parameter.name: StartDate

parameter.description: Ending date (exclusive YYYY-MM-DD).
parameter.name: EndDate

parameter.description: Scheduling location abbreviation. See GetSchedulingLocations.
parameter.name: SchedulingLoc

parameter.description: Scheduling department abbreviation. See GetSchedulingDepartments.
parameter.name: SchedulingDept

action.label: GetAvailableTimeBlocks
action.name: GetAvailableTimeBlocks
action.description: Returns eligible appointment types for time blocks in the given period. To be used with GetAvailableSchedule to determine appointment availability.

parameter.description: Appointment resource abbreviation. See GetResources.
parameter.name: Resource

parameter.description: Starting date.
parameter.name: StartDate

parameter.description: Ending date (exclusive).
parameter.name: EndDate

parameter.description: Scheduling location abbreviation. See GetSchedulingLocations.
parameter.name: SchedulingLoc

parameter.description: Scheduling department abbreviation. See GetSchedulingDepartments.
parameter.name: SchedulingDept

action.label: GetResources
action.name: GetResources
action.description: Provides a list of available resources.

action.label: GetSchedule
action.name: GetSchedule
action.description: List appointments for the specified date or date range, for an individual user, a list of users or all users, appointment types, and appointment statuses.

parameter.description: Schedule Date. You can enter a single date (for example, 3/24/2015), or you can enter a date range separated by a pipe (3/24/2015|3/29/2015). There is no predefined limit on the range of dates supplied to this parameter. However, to avoid performance issues, it is recommended that an application enforce a limit to the duration required (e.g., 30 days).
parameter.name: StartDate

parameter.description: Changed since (show any new changes for Schedule Date), that is changes for today's schedule since today at 10:17.
parameter.name: ChangedSince

parameter.description: Pipe-delimited list of scheduling location abbreviations.
parameter.name: SchedulingFilter

parameter.description: Sought user (other user whose schedule you want to pull). Use "All" to return schedules for all users. Or pipe delimited list for a list of practitioner's abbreviations.
parameter.name: SoughtUser

parameter.description: Pipe-delimited list of desired appointment types.
parameter.name: AppointmentType

parameter.description: Active - returns appointments with statuses of Acknowledge, Confirmed, Scheduled, and Wait Listed. ActiveNS - returns appointments with statuses included in Active list in addition to No-show. Inactive - returns appointments with statuses of Canceled, No-show, and Bumped. All (or no value) - returns appointments with any status.
parameter.name: AppointmenStatus

action.label: GetScheduleByPatientID
action.name: GetScheduleByPatientID
action.description: Returns all appointments for a specified patient ID.

action.label: GetSchedulingDepartments
action.name: GetSchedulingDepartments
action.description: Generates a list of scheduling departments.

action.label: GetSchedulingLocations
action.name: GetSchedulingLocations
action.description: Returns a list of scheduling locations.

parameter.description: Search on abbreviation or description
parameter.name: SearchTerm

parameter.description: Abbreviation for scheduling department. Supplying this will filter results to only those scheduling locations that share a department with the supplied scheduling department.
parameter.name: SchedulingDept

action.label: SaveAppointment
action.name: SaveAppointment
action.description: Creates an appointment for the specified patient.

parameter.description: <appt> <appointmentDateTime>06/15/2015 13:30</appointmentDateTime> <appointmentDuration>30</appointmentDuration> <!-- minutes --> <appointmentType>OV</appointmentType> <!-- GetAppointmentTypes.Abbreviation --> <schedulingLocation>OFFICE</schedulingLocation> <!-- GetSchedulingLocations.Abbreviation --> <schedulingDepartment>OFFICE</schedulingDepartment> <!-- GetSchedulingDepartments.Abbreviation --> <resource>ANNANE</resource> <!-- GetResources.Abbreviation --> <comments>Appointment saved from Unity</comments> <referDr>Bones</referDr> </appt>
parameter.name: XMLPayload
parameter.testWith: "<appt> <appointmentDateTime>07/26/2017 1:00PM</appointmentDateTime> <appointmentDuration>5</appointmentDuration> <!-- minutes --> <appointmentType>FOLLOWUP</appointmentType> <!-- GetAppointmentTypes.Abbreviation --> <schedulingLocation>OFFICE</schedulingLocation> <!-- GetSchedulingLocations.Abbreviation --> <schedulingDepartment>OFFICE</schedulingDepartment> <!-- GetSchedulingDepartments.Abbreviation --> <resource>MARFEE</resource> <!-- GetResources.Abbreviation --> <comments>Appointment saved from Unity by Yosi</comments> <referDr></referDr> </appt>"

action.label: SetAppointmentStatus
action.name: SetAppointmentStatus
action.description: Updates the status of a given appointment.

parameter.description: See GetAppointmentsByChangeDTTM .
parameter.name: AppointmentID

parameter.description: Options are as follows: A = Acknowledge B = Bumped C = Confirmed X = Canceled N = No Show W = Wait Listed S = Scheduled
parameter.name: NewAppointmentStatus

parameter.description: Date and time the status change occurred. If no value is passed, the current server date time will be used.
parameter.name: UpdateDate

parameter.description: Time of update in integer format. For example, 11:30 a.m. would be 1130, and 2:00 p.m. would be 1400.
parameter.name: UpdateTime

parameter.description: When confirming an appointment, you may pass in a confirmation result ID. See GetAppointmentConfirmationResults for available values.
parameter.name: ConfirmResultID

parameter.description: When bumping or canceling an appointment, a bump or cancel reason can be specified here. See GetAppointmentCancellationReasons for available values.
parameter.name: ReasonID
